This column is about the name of the equipment type used in the transport management system for the mining company Magaya. It likely contains names that identify different types of equipment used for transporting materials in the mining industry.

examples: Excavator - Used for digging and moving large quantities of earth, rocks, and minerals.
Dump Truck - Designed to transport heavy materials such as ore, gravel, and waste over long distances.
Bulldozer - Used for pushing, digging, and leveling various materials on a construction site.
Wheel Loader - Equipped with a front bucket to handle tasks like loading and transporting materials across short distances.
Dozer - Ideal for clearing and leveling lands, pushing soil, and creating a smooth surface for construction.
Articulated Truck - Features a hinge between the cab and the bed for enhanced maneuverability on rough terrain.
Motor Grader - Primarily used for road construction and maintenance, leveling soil, and creating a flat surface.
Compact Excavator - Suitable for tasks in confined spaces, landscaping, and light construction work.
Skid Steer Loader - Known for its versatility in handling various attachments for tasks like digging, grading, and lifting.
Drill Rig - Used for drilling holes into the ground for exploration, blasting, or extracting minerals.
Water Truck - Designed to transport water for dust suppression, firefighting, and other construction-related tasks.
Crane Truck - Equipped with a crane for lifting heavy materials and equipment at construction sites.
Wheel Tractor Scraper - Combines the functionalities of a tractor and a scraper for earthmoving applications.
Paver - Used for laying asphalt on roads and creating smooth surfaces for vehicular traffic.
Mobile Crusher - Enables on-site crushing of rocks, concrete, and construction waste for recycling purposes.
Excavator with Rock Breaker - Enhances the excavator's capability to break and remove large rocks efficiently.
Boom Lift - Provides aerial access for maintenance, construction, and installation tasks at heights.
Front Shovel Excavator - Features a shovel attachment at the front for better digging and loading capabilities.
Concrete Mixer Truck - Used for transporting and mixing concrete to construction sites for building structures.
Scissor Lift - Offers vertical access for maintenance tasks, painting, and installation work indoors.
